item.description:
Changing to Finagle a Bagel NEXT month.
We can have our own table at this event, but joining the BVS Wednesday Dining Out this time around, which will make it free of fees for us:
WEDNESDAY, MAY 11, 6:30 - 8:30 P.M.

Please join us in welcoming the new vegan restaurant to town! Our May Dining Out will be on the second Wednesday rather than our usual first Wednesday.

Happy Buddha
5 Beach Street, ground floor, near the corner of Washington Street
Chinatown, Boston

We've arranged a diverse fixed menu so we can taste a wide range of Happy Buddha's low-fat, home-style Vietnamese & Chinese cuisine. We will be served family style at tables of six or eight. Very late arrivals can order from the menu if the group is already finished eating.

Appetizers:
- Papaya Salad
- Fresh Spring Rolls
- Steamed Dumpling
- Fried Spring Rolls
- Bi Cuon Rolls
- Fried Wonton
- Sweet and Sour Soup

Entrees
- Tofu Lemongrass
- Sweet and Sour Vegi-Chicken
- Combination Fried Rice
- Crispy Vegi-Fish with Ginger Sauce
- Vegi-Beef with Broccoli
- Stir-Fried Lo-Mein with Vegetable
- Happy Buddha Curry Fried Rice w/ broccoli, carrots, fresh basil leaves
- Brown Rice

Beverages:
- Hot/Cold Tea
- Lemonade

$12.50 + tax + tip = $15.40

Please RSVP (click Reply, give # attending) to help them with planning.

DIRECTIONS BY T:

Happy Buddha is on Beach St. near the corner of Washington St. (It is right next door to Original Buddha's Delight, also a vegan Asian restaurant,

BVSWednesday Dining Out
WEDNESDAY, MAY 11, 6:30 - 8:30 P.M.

Please join us in welcoming the new vegan restaurant to town! Our May Dining Out will be on the second Wednesday rather than our usual first Wednesday.

Happy Buddha
5 Beach Street, ground floor, near the corner of Washington Street
Chinatown, Boston

We've arranged a diverse fixed menu so we can taste a wide range of Happy Buddha's low-fat, home-style Vietnamese & Chinese cuisine. We will be served family style at tables of six or eight. Very late arrivals can order from the menu if the group is already finished eating.

Appetizers:
- Papaya Salad
- Fresh Spring Rolls
- Steamed Dumpling
- Fried Spring Rolls
- Bi Cuon Rolls
- Fried Wonton
- Sweet and Sour Soup

Entrees
- Tofu Lemongrass
- Sweet and Sour Vegi-Chicken
- Combination Fried Rice
- Crispy Vegi-Fish with Ginger Sauce
- Vegi-Beef with Broccoli
- Stir-Fried Lo-Mein with Vegetable
- Happy Buddha Curry Fried Rice w/ broccoli, carrots, fresh basil leaves
- Brown Rice

Beverages:
- Hot/Cold Tea
- Lemonade

$12.50 + tax + tip = $15.40

Please RSVP (click Reply, give # attending) to help them with planning.

DIRECTIONS BY T:

Happy Buddha is on Beach St. near the corner of Washington St. (It is right next door to Original Buddha's Delight, also a vegan Asian restaurant, so it could be confusing.) Beach St. is the main street that runs the length of Chinatown. It is two blocks from the Green Line and one block from the Orange Line.

Green Line T to Boylston St. station. Cross Tremont St. towards the Masonic building and walk one block south on Boylston St. Turn right onto Washington St. Walk one block. Turn left onto Beach St., and Happy Buddha is just 50 ft. or so from the corner.

Orange Line T to Chinatown stop. Exit station and turn left on Washington St. Walk one block to Beach St. Turn left on Beach St., and Happy Buddha is just 50 ft. or so from the corner.

BY CAR:

Type in 5 Beach St. Boston MA at maps.yahoo.com

PARKING:

Metered street parking in the area. Pay garage on Beach St. diagonally across the street from Happy Buddha.

617- 451-1121 Happy Buddha
617- 424-8846 BVS

Dining is on street level; rest rooms are up a flight of stairs.


For more information, see www.BostonVeg.org
